00027 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00028 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00029 #include "LinearTriangle.hpp"
00030 
00031 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00032 
00033 static const char* nonlinear_error 
00034  = "Attempt to use LinearTriangle mapping function for a nonlinear element\n";
00035 
00036 EntityTopology LinearTriangle::element_topology() const
00037   { return TRIANGLE; }
00038   
00039 int LinearTriangle::num_nodes() const
00040   { return 3; }
00041 
00042 NodeSet LinearTriangle::sample_points( NodeSet ) const
00043 {
00044   NodeSet result;
00045   result.set_mid_face_node(0);
00046   return result;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void LinearTriangle::coefficients( Sample loc,
00050                                    NodeSet nodeset,
00051                                    double* coeff_out,
00052                                    size_t* indices_out,
00053                                    size_t& num_coeff,
00054                                    MsqError& err ) const
00055 {
00056   if (nodeset.have_any_mid_node()) {
00057     MSQ_SETERR(err)(nonlinear_error, MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00058     return;
00059   }
00060   
00061   switch (loc.dimension) {
00062     case 0:
00063       num_coeff = 1;
00064       indices_out[0] = loc.number;
00065       coeff_out[0] = 1.0;
00066       break;
00067     case 1:
00068       num_coeff = 2;
00069       indices_out[0] = loc.number;
00070       indices_out[1] = (loc.number+1)%3;
00071       coeff_out[0] = 0.5;
00072       coeff_out[1] = 0.5;
00073       break;
00074     case 2:
00075       num_coeff = 3;
00076       indices_out[0] = 0;
00077       indices_out[1] = 1;
00078       indices_out[2] = 2;
00079       coeff_out[0] = coeff_out[1] = coeff_out[2] = MSQ_ONE_THIRD;
00080       break;
00081     default:
00082       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid/unsupported logical dimension",MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00083   }
00084 }
00085 
00086 void LinearTriangle::derivatives( Sample ,
00087                                   NodeSet nodeset,
00088                                   size_t* vertices,
00089                                   MsqVector<2>* coeff_derivs,
00090                                   size_t& num_vtx,
00091                                   MsqError& err ) const
00092 {
00093   if (nodeset.have_any_mid_node()) {
00094     MSQ_SETERR(err)(nonlinear_error, MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00095   }
00096   else {
00097     num_vtx = 3;
00098     vertices[0] = 0;
00099     vertices[1] = 1;
00100     vertices[2] = 2;
00101     
00102     coeff_derivs[0][0] = -1.0;
00103     coeff_derivs[0][1] = -1.0;
00104     coeff_derivs[1][0] = 1.0;
00105     coeff_derivs[1][1] = 0.0;
00106     coeff_derivs[2][0] = 0.0;
00107     coeff_derivs[2][1] = 1.0;
00108   }
00109 }
00110 
00111 void LinearTriangle::ideal( Sample , 
00112                             MsqMatrix<3,2>& J,
00113                             MsqError&  ) const
00114 {
00115 //  const double g = 1.074569931823542; // sqrt(2/sqrt(3));
00116 //  J(0,0) = g;    J(0,1) = 0.5*g;
00117 //  J(1,0) = 0.0;  J(1,1) = 1.0/g;
00118 //  J(2,0) = 0.0;  J(2,1) = 0.0;
00119     const double a = 0.70710678118654746; // 1/sqrt(2)
00120     const double b = 1.3160740129524924;  // 4th root of 3
00121     J(0,0) = -a/b; J(0,1) =  a/b;
00122     J(1,0) = -a*b; J(1,1) = -a*b;
00123     J(2,0) =  0.0; J(2,1) =  0.0;
00124 }
00125
